info.name: revamped: hot pink pint (pink gradient bg)
info.description:
~ dupe of my hot pink pint style, but better
~ all pink text and elements ✮⋆˙
~ cute dancing hello kitty gif 
~ new: pink gradient bg !! (gets cut off at some parts, but still cute ig)
~ all pinterest css styles are a l w a y s a WIP, expect random updates ૮ ˶ᵔ ᵕ ᵔ˶ ა (not currently, but be prepared)
~ made by @jxchu_luv (find me on  pinterest and yt♡~)
info.additionalInfo:
<33
~ if u have any potential suggestions or ideas for the look, I encourage u to DM me on Pinterest :))
~ (4/8/24) if it's not working for yall don't come for me, it's not working for me either this time :'(

tampermonkey ver (no gradient bg): 
// ==UserScript==
// @name         Custom Style for Pinterest
// @namespace    http://tampermonkey.net/
// @version      0.1
// @description  Apply custom styles to Pinterest pages
// @author       You
// @match        https://www.pinterest.com/*
// @grant        GM_addStyle
// ==/UserScript==

GM_addStyle(`
  /* Original Styles */

  .tBJ,
  .gUZ,
  .Hn_,
  .x8f,
  .RCK,
  .swG {
    color: #ff51a0 !important;
  }

  /* Set text color to #FFF for most elements */
  body {
    color: #FFF !important;
  }

  /* Set background color for specific elements */
  .downloadButton,
  .P_h,
  .z17,
  .RCK,
  .Lfz {    
    background-color: #ff7ebf !important;
  }
  
  /* Set background color for specific elements */
  ._O1{
    background-color: #ffc4e2 !important;
  }

  /* Set background color for the rest of the elements to #FFFFFF */
  body {
    background-color: #FFFFFF !important;
    background-size: cover !important;
    background-repeat: no-repeat !important;
    background-attachment: fixed !important;
    background-position: center center !important;
  }

  /* Background image properties - placed at top right */
  body::before {
    content: "";
    position: fixed;
    top: 49px; /* Adjust the top position */
    right: 99px; /* Adjust the right position */
    width: 150px; /* Adjust the width of the GIF */
    height: 170px; /* Adjust the height of the GIF */
    background-image: url('https://i.imgur.com/adHpm6C.gif') !important; /* Please verify the correctness of this URL */
    background-position: center !important;
    background-repeat: no-repeat !important;
    background-size: 86% !important; /* Set the background size to 86% */
    z-index: 9999 !important; /* Ensure it's above other elements */
  }

  /*---------- Additional Styles ----------*/

  /* BUTTON */
  .gpV {
    background-color: var(--by_ix-color_pink2) !important;
  }
  .bmw, .Jea.Lfz.gjz.hA-.wYR.zI7.iyn.Hsu {
    background-color: var(--by_ix-color_dark5) !important;
  }
  .bmw:focus, .bmw:hover, .W6-:focus, .W6-:hover, .Jea.Lfz.gjz.hA-.wYR.zI7.iyn.Hsu:hover, .DUt.XiG._wN.eZS.hA-.wYR.zI7.iyn.Hsu:hover, ._HI, .eZS, .Il7:focus, .Il7:hover, .zI8:focus, .zI8:hover, .BsF:hover, .BsF:focus {
    background-color: var(--by_ix-color_dark6) !important;
  }
  .xD4 {
    min-height: 40px;
  }
  .hUC {
    padding-bottom: 10px;
    padding-top: 10px;
  }
  .RCK {
    border-radius: 30px !important;
  }
  .BsF {
    background-color: var(--by_ix-color_pink2);
  }
  .Jrn {
    background-color: var(--by_ix-color_pink2);
  }    
  .NSs.bPW, .NSs.Xsi {
    background-color: var(--by_ix-color_pink2);
  }

  /* Elements color #ffc4e2 */
  .uom, .zI7, .iyn, .Hsu, .lH1, .dyH, .iFc, .H2s, .sAJ, .X8m, .zDA, .IZT {
    color: #ffc4e2 !important;
  }
  
  /* Text color white */
  .uom, .tg7 {
    color: #fff !important;
  }

  /* Background color for .uom */
  .uom {
    background-color: #ffe8f4 !important;
  }
`);
